page.title: 19LYMMVILLE
page.content: Lymmville is the local coach hire company. It is an independent, family run firm. The yard where they are located is on the main Warrington road out of Lymm, near to the Thelwall Viaduct carrying the M6. The owner started out by hiring out his minibus, which he drove, in l97O. The company has slowly grown until now he owns 6 coaches. Five of these have 45 seats, the other one has 53 - but there is no minibus. The staff of Lymmville consist of the owner and his son who work as drivers; there are two other full time drivers and one part-time driver, as well as a mechanic who also drives. There is also an apprentice mechanic who is on a YTS scheme, and an office girl.The coaches are driven all over the country,and cover 3OOOO miles per year but income comes from local contracts.
